properties.name: scim.mongodb.dbname
properties.description: The MongoDB database name for SCIM date. DEFAULT SCIM

properties.name: scim.schema.path
properties.description: Core SCIM shema to boot server (Default loads from classpth)

properties.name: scim.resourcetype.path
properties.description: ResourceTypes JSON configuration (Default loads from classpath)

properties.name: scim.json.pretty
properties.description: When TRUE, all JSON output rendered in easy-reading format (Default false)

properties.name: scim.query.max.resultsize
properties.description: The maximum number of results that may be performed in a search (Default 1000)

properties.name: scim.thread.count
properties.description: The number of pooled worker threads (Default 5).

properties.name: scim.query.max.errors
properties.description: The maximum number of errors that may occur in a single bulk request (Default 5)

properties.name: scim.bulk.max.ops
properties.description: The maximum number of operations in a single bulk request (Default 1000)

properties.name: scim.persist.schema
properties.description: When true, default schema and resourceType definitions will be added to database (DEFAULT TRUE)
